languages.text: {n}Символ на перстне ал, как кровь праведников.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорд-инквизитору. Алый означает, что вам довелось пролить кровь во благо Империума. Значит, и вы стоите того, чтобы за вас пролили кровь Его слуги".

traits.locale_text: {n}Символ на перстне ал, как кровь праведников.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорду-инквизитору. Алый означает, что вам довелось пролить кровь во благо Империума. Значит, и вы стоите того, чтобы за вас пролили кровь Его слуги".

languages.text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."
languages.original_text: {n}Символ на перстне ал, как кровь праведников.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорд-инквизитору. Алый означает, что вам довелось пролить кровь во благо Империума. Значит, и вы стоите того, чтобы за вас пролили кровь Его слуги".

Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve having His servants shed their blood for you."

languages.text: {n}印章指輪の紋章は正義の血を示す赤だ。{/n}「色は指輪の持ち主とロード・インクィジターとの関係を表す。緋色は帝国のために血を流した証。すなわち、お前は従者が血を流すにふさわしいということ」
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章指輪の紋章は正義の血を示す赤だ。{/n}「色は指輪の持ち主とロード・インクィジターとの関係を表す。緋色は帝国のために血を流した証。すなわち、お前は従者が血を流すにふさわしいということ」

languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

languages.text: {n}戒指上的图章殷红如鲜血。{/n}“图章的颜色代表持有者与大审判官的关系。红色代表你曾为捍卫帝国的利益浴血奋战，因此，神皇的仆人也必将为你流血牺牲。”
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒指上的图章殷红如鲜血。{/n}“图章的颜色代表持有者与审判长的关系。红色代表你曾为捍卫帝国的利益浴血奋战，因此，神皇的仆人也必将为你流血牺牲。”

languages.text: {n}El símbolo del anillo es rojo como la sangre de los justos.{/n} «El color indica el nivel de proximidad de su portador al Lord Inquisidor. El escarlata indica que ha derramado su sangre por el bien del Imperium y por lo tanto merece que sus sirvientes derramen su sangre por usted».
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El símbolo del anillo es rojo como la sangre de los justos.{/n} «El color indica el nivel de proximidad de su portador al Lord Inquisidor. El escarlata indica que ha derramado su sangre por el bien del Imperium y por lo tanto merece que sus sirvientes derramen su sangre por usted».

languages.text: {n}Le symbole ornant la chevalière est d'un rouge qui n'est pas sans rappeler le sang des justes.{/n} « La couleur indique à quel point vous êtes proche du seigneur inquisiteur. Le rouge signifie que vous avez versé votre sang pour le bien de l'Imperium. En conséquence, vous méritez que Ses serviteurs en fassent de même pour vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le symbole ornant la chevalière est d'un rouge qui n'est pas sans rappeler le sang des justes.{/n} « La couleur indique à quel point vous êtes proche du seigneur inquisiteur. Le rouge signifie que vous avez versé votre sang pour le bien de l'Imperium. En conséquence, vous méritez que Ses serviteurs en fassent de même pour vous. »

languages.text: {n}Das Symbol auf dem Siegel ist rot wie das Blut der Rechtschaffenen.{/n} "Die Farbe zeigt an, wie nah der Träger dem Großinquisitor steht. Rot bedeutet, dass Ihr Euer Blut zum Wohle des Imperiums vergossen habt. Und darum verdient Ihr auch, dass Seine Diener ihr Blut für Euch vergießen."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Symbol auf dem Siegel ist rot wie das Blut der Rechtschaffenen.{/n} "Die Farbe zeigt an, wie nah der Träger dem Großinquisitor steht. Rot bedeutet, dass Ihr Euer Blut zum Wohle des Imperiums vergossen habt. Und darum verdient Ihr auch, dass Seine Diener ihr Blut für Euch vergießen."

languages.text: {n}Mührün üzerindeki sembol, inananların kanı gibi kızıl.{/n} "Renk, yüzüğün taşıyıcısının Lord Engizisyoncu'ya yakınlık derecesini ifade eder. Kızıl, İmparatorluk'un iyiliği adına kan döktüğün anlamına gelir. Dolayısıyla O'nun hizmetkârlarının da senin için kan dökmesine layıksın demektir."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is red as the blood of the righteous.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. Scarlet means that you have shed your blood for the good of the Imperium. And therefore, you deserve to have His servants shed their blood for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mührün üzerindeki sembol, inananların kanı gibi kızıl.{/n} "Renk, yüzüğün taşıyıcısının Lord Engizisyoncu'ya yakınlık derecesini ifade eder. Kızıl, İmparatorluk'un iyiliği adına kan döktüğün anlamına gelir. Dolayısıyla O'nun hizmetkârlarının da senin için kan dökmesine layıksın demektir."
